hero.title: Connect. Create. Share with other developers.
hero.subtitle: devs is the platform for developers where you can share your projects, build your professional profile, and take on challenges that showcase your skills.

spotlights.title: Connect with developers from around the world
spotlights.description: Join a global network of developers to share ideas, learn, and collaborate on exciting projects.

spotlights.title: Build your profile and showcase your skills
spotlights.description: Customize your profile, display your projects and achievements, and grow your professional presence within the Dev community.

spotlights.title: Share your projects and get feedback
spotlights.description: Post your projects to receive constructive feedback and improve your skills while helping others with their ideas.

spotlights.title: Challenges to test your skills
spotlights.description: Take part in interactive challenges that allow you to learn and grow by tackling real-world programming problems.

spotlights.title: Access articles, tutorials, and resources
spotlights.description: Read articles, tutorials, and resources created by the community to keep up with the latest trends in development.

footer.subtitle: A platform for developers, by developers. Stay updated with the latest trends and tools.
footer.description: Devs is a community-driven platform for developers to discover, share, and stay updated on the latest in web development. Join us to grow your skills and collaborate with fellow devs.
